roleset.name: to gather or bring together
roleset.note: MUSTER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'muster' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from muster.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Mr. Runkel says [0] he doubts [0]Mr. Kennedy can muster enough congressional support [*] to reorganize the Justice Department .
example.arg: enough congressional support [*] to reorganize the Justice Department
